body_html: Thanks for your contribution. Please be aware that there is a proposal to remove tensorflow/contrib/cmake/ now that Bazel is supported on all of the platforms for which we build TensorFlow binaries. You might want to comment on that discussion if you rely on this build system.
body_text: Thanks for your contribution. Please be aware that there is a proposal to remove tensorflow/contrib/cmake/ now that Bazel is supported on all of the platforms for which we build TensorFlow binaries. You might want to comment on that discussion if you rely on this build system.
body: Thanks for your contribution. Please be aware that there is a [proposal](https://github.com/tensorflow/community/pull/18/files#diff-eef567fcebc6a5988c0fa92c7bb38526R173) to remove `tensorflow/contrib/cmake/` now that Bazel is supported on all of the platforms for which we build TensorFlow binaries. You might want to comment on that discussion if you rely on this build system.
